TopicTitle: How do you get the signatures?

Articles.Content: Hey I see a whole bunch of people with signatures how do I get them though?

Click your profile picture at the top right corner

Click account settings

On the eft side of the page, there should be a list of things.

At the bottom is the signature section

Edit and enjoy!
On your Account Page, top right there is a little arrow right of your avatar image. From there, go to Account Settings, you'll find Signatures in the left hand menu.
